name.ja: <ruby>神芸学徒<rt>アルトメギア</rt></ruby> リテラ

text.en: You take no battle damage from battles involving this card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Artmegia Litera" once per turn. If you control an "Artmegia" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 "Artmegia" card from your GY to your hand. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Artmegia" monster from your hand or GY, except "Artmegia Litera", then return this card from the field to the hand.
